Working together with @Honda, we‚Äôll put people around the world into #EVs faster than either company could do on its own, in the most popular segments, with great quality, at a high volume.

This collaboration is a perfect example of how our vision of creating an all-electric future for everyone is leading us to leverage GM‚Äôs amazing technology, like Ultium, to make an even bigger impact.
Together, we are working to enable global production of millions of EVs starting in 2027 ‚Äì beyond GM‚Äôs current global capacity target of 2 million EVs by 2025.

The newest @GM + @Honda project will share our best technology, design, and sourcing strategies to deliver affordable & desirable #EVs globally. We‚Äôre targeting the world‚Äôs most popular vehicle segments, including key markets in North America, South America and China.

Today @GM is announcing the next chapter in our collaboration with @Honda. Continuing GM‚Äôs mission to put everyone in an EV, we‚Äôre working together to make #ElectricVehicles more affordable and accessible using next-generation Ultium technology as the foundation.
